Interface TasksViewAPI

public interface TasksViewAPI
View-side API for Tasks MVVM. The Swing View depends ONLY on this interface. No model/DAO types or logic should leak into the View. Responsibilities expected by the UI: - Expose observable tasks list (Observer). - CRUD operations (add/update/delete/deleteAll). - State change (markState). - Filtering via Combinator (applyFilter / clearFilter). - Report export via Visitor (exportReport). All methods must be UI-thread safe to invoke (caller is the EDT).

  • Method Details

    • tasksProperty

      Property<List<ITask>> tasksProperty()
      Observable list of tasks after applying the current filter. The UI binds its JTable model to this property and re-renders when it fires change events.

    • addTask

      void addTask(String title, String description, TaskState state) throws ViewModelException
      Add a new task.
      Parameters:
      title - non-null/non-blank
      description - nullable/optional (as per model validation)
      state - non-null (ToDo/InProgress/Completed)
      Throws:
      ViewModelException - on validation/persistence error

    • updateTask

      void updateTask(int id, String title, String description, TaskState state) throws ViewModelException
      Update an existing task by id.
      Parameters:
      id - existing task id
      title - non-null/non-blank
      description - nullable/optional
      state - non-null
      Throws:
      ViewModelException - on validation/persistence error or if id not found

    • deleteTask

      void deleteTask(int id) throws ViewModelException
      Delete a single task by id.
      Parameters:
      id - existing task id
      Throws:
      ViewModelException - if id not found or on persistence error

    • deleteAllTasks

      void deleteAllTasks() throws ViewModelException
      Delete all tasks (used by ControlPanel bulk action).
      Throws:
      ViewModelException - on persistence error

    • markState

      void markState(int id, TaskState newState) throws ViewModelException
      Mark task lifecycle state (State pattern).
      Parameters:
      id - task id
      newState - target state
      Throws:
      ViewModelException - on invalid transition or persistence error

    • applyFilter

      void applyFilter(ITaskFilter filter) throws ViewModelException
      Apply a composable filter (e.g., by title AND state). The implementation should update tasksProperty() accordingly and notify observers.
      Parameters:
      filter - non-null combinator filter
      Throws:
      ViewModelException - when filter application fails

    • clearFilter

      void clearFilter() throws ViewModelException
      Clear any active filter, restoring the full tasks list.
      Throws:
      ViewModelException - if refresh fails

    • exportReport

      void exportReport(ExportFormat format, Path path) throws ViewModelException
      Export a report using the Visitor-based reporting implemented in the domain. The format is provided by ExportFormat and the file path is absolute or user-chosen.
      Parameters:
      format - export format (e.g., CSV, TXT)
      path - target file path
      Throws:
      ViewModelException - on IO or reporting failures
